::Triggerhappy::

       Triggerhappy listened to Windrider and Drag Strip.

         "Both of you shutup, or I'll waste some time scrapping you!" He
said, shooting his photon cannon things on his jet at the ground in front of
them but not to actually seriously damage them.  Triggerhappy then tuned up
his speed.

          "My scanners detect some sort of base, I can't figure it out, it's
too far away," He said.
